title: The Cannon
description: Sawyer Tom is a tall Texan with an easy smile. It masks his rough start in life.Now destiny has flipped the story for the baseball phenom, and life’s riches are within his grasp.But it’s the chance meeting with a beautiful stubborn girl that has him reaching.Bristol Swift is the only daughter in a Memphis baseball dynasty. What stands out most though, is her apathy to the game and its’ players.As far as she’s concerned, her medical practice deserves all the attention.Funny how a look, a touch, one dance, can change two worlds.Authors note: While this is part of the Swift Series, and can be read as a standalone for best reader experience read them in order.The Curve- AtticusThe Closer- BrickThe Cannon- Bristol
author: Leslie Pike
